channel.title: My new site - Scar Resources - scar scripts, tutorials and info
channel.description:
[center][glow=red,2,300]Scar Resources[/glow][/center]
hi guys,
well ive spent quite a while getting this together between schoolwork, scripting and some other stuff but hey yay its on teh web :). I spent around 2 days looking for good hosting and i finnaly found some. The link is:
[CENTER][url=http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/]http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/[/url]
or click [URL=http://"http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/"]HERE[/URL][/CENTER]
Please comment on the layout, desighn and professionalism of the site. Im nto the best speller ever and even spellcheckers suck sometimes :D. This is my first real site all written in html and im quite happy with it.
If you would me to host any of your scripts or tutorials please say so and thankyou to starblaster100 for his free scripts. I hope to build up form what the site is know and host alot lot more than we allready have.
O and if you like the site please just click on the ad's once or twice so that i can buy a real domain some day :)
[center][u]edits and updates ~[/u]
thx for the feedback guys, here is a lil update.....
bebmycat2's beginners tutorial has been added, check it out at here:
http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/tutorials.html
. link to the scar downlaod know opens in a new page also . phantombmx's feather buyer deluxe has been added. . Please check the site out either tomorrow or friday for the new video section and maybe video of the day.
Chatroom : http://scar-resources.ir8.ca/cgi-sys/mchat.cgi?channel=scar-resources.ir8.ca
thx,
p.s. if anyone has anything else they want submitted just say [/center]
[CENTER]The forums are know up! please check them out at either -[/CENTER] [CENTER][url=http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/forum/]http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/forum/[/url] or through the homepage [url=http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca]http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca[/url][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Please register and vote for the new video of the week and maybe discuss some stuff or submit some scripts, thx.[/CENTER]
friends, fellow scripters,
i am know hosting my newsletter that i showed you all last mounth (i think) ive added some things and every mounth the design will change and new news will be added :)
you can find it here [CENTER] - [url=http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/gamersupdate.html]http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/gamersupdate.html[/url] or [URL=http://"http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/gamersupdate.html"]HERE[/URL][/CENTER]
please check it out and post some feedback :) i greatly appreciate it.

item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy

Very nice. Is there any forum(s) for this site (or for SCAR, lol) ?
If there is, expect me to be a member.

item.source: My new site - Scar Resources - scar scripts, tutorials and info

item.title: My new site - Scar Resources - scar scripts, tutorials and info
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

Hi guys,

     The Weekly video page has been added!, yes each week i will be hosting the most popular video voted by the people (when the forums are done) for all to enjoy. Currently im hosting soemthing non-scar related and non runescape related but its still a very good video, the lyrics are really sweet....Please watch, listen and then post some feedback no the current video please :)

check it out:
[CENTER]http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/videopage.html
or HERE[/CENTER]

Pleae i also need some constructive criticism on the page layout itself, good or bad? what needs inproving? please post them. Thx for looking.

p.s. If anyone else would like to commit any scripts please say say. I hope to add an archeive once we get enough scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: My new site - Scar Resources - scar scripts, tutorials and info
item.dc:creator: @jordyscape jordyscape
item.description:
@jordyscape wrote:

Yo i have a domain and hosting i just didnt know what i was going to use it for when i got it so if u want to use it pm me

domains
www.venmart.com.au, really shitty at moment but im sure if u gave me all the shit i could have it up and running in no time:) 15 mins min

item.title: My new site - Scar Resources - scar scripts, tutorials and info
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:2, topic:3827”]Looks pretty cool, awesome layout, nice design, professional-like colors.

Its gonna be a great site in my opinion, and could you tell me the host? ;D

EDIT: Also, you might want to use CSS to make a special “box” for the Code.
Especially in tutorial section. Otherwise, I’m lovin it![/quote]

ok thankyou, im not too sure how to do that buy as they say google is our friend ill look around…

@1337h4x wrote:

Looks pretty cool, awesome layout, nice design, professional-like colors.

Its gonna be a great site in my opinion, and could you tell me the host? ;D

EDIT: Also, you might want to use CSS to make a special “box” for the Code.
Especially in tutorial section. Otherwise, I’m lovin it!
